State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN THE SCHOHARIE CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN, ALBANY, DELAWARE, GREENE, MONTGOMERY, OTSEGO, SCHENECTADY AND SCHOHARIE
COUNTIES, NEW YORK. EXCEPT THE WATERS CONTAINED WITHIN BOUNDARIES OF
STATE-OWNED FOREST PRESERVE LANDS

Schoharie Reservoir

From Gilboa Dam to 0.25 mile below NY Route 23

and regulations adopted by the New York City Board of Water Supply and the

Department of Water Supply, Gas and Electricity and approved by the State

Department of Health. L-22nw L-22sw

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
